title: Tekken 3 OT Golden Leon (PC/PSX)
description:
The one and only Tekken 3 OT Golden Leon brought to you by BioMass. 

It's a PC/PSX emulator version but due to freeze in score screen (top 10 fighters) i recommend to you to play it on PC rather on emulator. 


To play it with gamepad do the following.



- Download (you have to!)

- Unpack   (because its a rar file)

- Run the !Tekken.reg file 

- Open ePSXe emulator

- Config the gamepad buttons/controls

- [OPTIONAL] Test your gamepad and see that the game really freezes (If not i wanna know)

- Close Emulator and Open Tekken (Windows Batch file)


Or if you want to play it with keyboard (why play it with keyboard anyway?) you gotta configure the buttons/controls in emulator first.

I got it tested with Microsoft Security Essentials, no virus and i don't know how to upload a results file of MSE. 


[SPOILER]

I hate all this PAL/NTSC copies of this game that fly all over the internet, so if you want to support my belief, seed this epic game and share with friends. Also you can re-upload the game and keep it alive from extinct. Comment, and have fun!

:)

-Biomass
